text:
:wave: Happy Friday everyone, <https://octopus.com|Octopus Deploy> is looking for two new B2B marketing hires. We’re a small marketing team, so the roles are a mix of content marketing, product marketing and everything else in between.

Octopus is a bootstrapped company, and we’re growing like crazy. We’re looking for smart people with strong writing skills to help grow our marketing capability. Octopus is a remote-first company based in Brisbane, Australia, and the roles are open to anywhere in Australia.

*<https://octopus.com/company/careers/3af39950-a2f7-47c1-a8e5-45664ea807d7|Digital Content Specialist - Australia - Octopus Deploy>*

Feel free to ping me if you have any questions. :slightly_smiling_face:

attachments.title: Deployment & Runbook Automation - Octopus Deploy
attachments.text: Octopus Deploy is an automated deployment and release management tool used by leading continuous delivery teams worldwide. Start your free trial today.
attachments.fallback: Octopus Deploy: Deployment & Runbook Automation - Octopus Deploy
